description:
In this course you will learn how to use the law of attraction in your own life to create the life that you really want. Throughout the course you will be provided with plenty of exercises, tips and information that will enable you to build powerful habits into your life so that you become a match for attracting the things that you want.

My goal is to help you create a law of attraction lifestyle, one that supports you in attracting your ideal life.

There are over 30 lessons in this course. Some of which can be completed straight away, whilst others will need to be built into your life as daily habits.

In this course you will learn and move through the 3 step law of attraction process and learn what the law of attraction responds to. With each lecture, you will gain knowledge on how to become more and more of a match for the things you want and ultimately the life you want.
title: Law of Attraction for Life
